name: FITQUEST Random Workout Generator
description:
This is a simple workout generator that I made when I was getting bored of my bodyweight routine. 
In the future, I'm planning a release that links to videos for each exercise! 

Randomizing workouts is fun, but you should always make sure you're ready to work out and have a doctor's approval before trying a new workout regimen. 

If you're a nerd who's interested in leveling up their fitness, join us at Fitquestonline.com!
